House_Arryn.name: House Arryn
coat of arms: A sky-blue falcon soaring against a white moon, on a sky-blue field
Bleu celeste, upon a plate a falcon rousant of the field
title: King of Mountain and Vale
(formerly)
Lord of the Eyrie
Defender of the Vale
Warden of the East

House_Baelish.name: House Baelish
coat of arms: A grey stone head with fiery eyes, on a light green field
Vert, a stone head cendr e, orbed gules

House_Belmore.name: House Belmore
coat of arms: Six silver bells, 3, 2, 1, on a purple field
Purpure, six bells, 3, 2, 1, argent
House_Belmore.title: Lord of Strongsong

House_Coldwater.name: House Coldwater
coat of arms: A blue pall with white borders, on a red field
Gules, a pall azure, fimbriated argent
House_Coldwater.title: Lord of Coldwater Burn

House_Corbray.name: House Corbray
coat of arms: Three black ravens in flight, holding three red hearts, on a white field
Argent, three ravens volant sable, each clutching in their claws a heart gules
title: Lord of the Five Fingers
(formerly)
King of the Fingers
(formerly)
Lord of Heart's Home

House_Donniger.name: House Donniger
coat of arms: A red sun rising from a grey-green sea, against a yellow sky
Per fesse wavy or and vert-cendr e, a demi-sun-in-splendour issuant from the line of division gules

House_Egen.name: House Egen
coat of arms: A yellow sun, white crescent moon, and silver star on a blue chief, above a white field
Argent, on a chief azure a moon increscent of the first between a sun-in-splendour or and a mullet of the first

House_Elesham.name: House Elesham
coat of arms: A black star between an inverted stone-coloured double-pile, on a pink field
(Rose, between two piles inverted cendr e a mullet sable)

House_Grafton.name: House Grafton
coat of arms: A yellow tower, burning, on a black pile, on a flame-red field
Gules, on a pile sable a tower or with flames issuant from the battlements proper
House_Grafton.title: Lord of Gulltown[1]

House_Hardyng.name: House Hardyng
coat of arms: A field of red and white diamonds
Lozengy argent and gules

House_Hersy.name: House Hersy
coat of arms: A white winged chalice, on a pink field
(Rose, a winged chalice displayed argent)

House_Hunter.name: House Hunter
coat of arms: Five silver arrows, fanned, on brown
(Brunâtre, a sheaf of five arrows, points to chief, argent)
House_Hunter.title: Lord of Longbow Hall

House_Lipps.name: House Lipps
coat of arms: Two large pink lips, on a dark blue field
Azure, a pair of lips carnation

House_Lynderly.name: House Lynderly
coat of arms: A black field strewn with green vipers
Sable, sem  of snakes vert
House_Lynderly.title: Lord of the Snakewood

House_Melcolm.name: House Melcolm
coat of arms: A rusty anchor, on a turquoise field, beneath yellow chief with three blue plates
(Aquamarine, an anchor rusted proper, on a chief or three hurts)

House_Moore.name: House Moore
coat of arms: Three bronze spearheads, on a white field, within a bronze embattled border
(Argent, three spearheads within a bordure embattled bronze)

House_Pryor.name: House Pryor
coat of arms: A partial eclipse, black moon over yellow sun, on a dusty pink field
(Rose, a sun-in-splendour or partially surmounted by a moon in her complement sable)

House_Redfort.name: House Redfort
coat of arms: A red castle, on a white field, within a red embattled border
Argent, a castle within a bordure embattled gules
House_Redfort.title: Lord of Redfort[1]

House_Royce.name: House Royce
coat of arms: Black iron studs on a bronze field, bordered with runes
(Bronze pellet , an orle of ancient runes sable)
title: High King of the Vale, the Fingers and the Mountains of the Moon
(formerly)
Bronze King
(formerly)
Lord of Runestone
House_Royce.cadet branch: Royce of the Gates of the Moon

House_Ruthermont.name: House Ruthermont
coat of arms: Five black starfish on a gold pale, on a field of pean
(Pean, on a pale or five starfish sable)

House_Tollett.name: House Tollett
coat of arms: Pily grey and black
Pily cendr e and sable
House_Tollett.title: Lord of the Grey Glen

House_Upcliff.name: House Upcliff
coat of arms: A cresting sea-green wave, on a black field
Sable, a wave cresting vert

House_Waynwood.name: House Waynwood
coat of arms: A broken black wheel, on a green field
Vert, a wheel broken sable
House_Waynwood.title: Lord of Ironoaks

House_Wydman.name: House Wydman
coat of arms: Five splintered lances, 3, 2, striped blue and white with blue pennons, on a yellow field, beneath a white chief bearing a red castle, a green viper, a black broken wheel, a purple unicorn and a yellow lion

Or, five broken lances, 3, 2, striped azure and argent, pennons of the second, on a chief of the third, a wheel broken sable between, on the dexter, a castle gules and snake vert, and, on the sinister, a unicorn rampant purpure and lion rampant of the field

House_Shett_of_Gull_Tower.name: House Shett of Gull Tower
coat of arms: Three golden wings, bendwise, on a checkered white and black field
Chequy argent and sable, in bend three dexter wings elevated bendwise or
House_Shett_of_Gull_Tower.title: The Knight of Gull Tower

House_Shett_of_Gulltown.name: House Shett of Gulltown
coat of arms: Nine white seagulls on a field of brown
(Brunâtre, nine seagulls argent)

House_Templeton.name: House Templeton
coat of arms: Nine stars, one of seven points and eight of six points, on a gold saltire, on a black field
Sable, on a saltire or, nine mullets of the field, that in fesse-point of seven points, all others of six points
House_Templeton.title: The Knight of Ninestars[1]

House_Waxley.name: House Waxley
coat of arms: Six candles, white with red flames, within silver candle holders, on a grey field within a black border
(Cendr e, six candles white in holders argent inflamed gules, within a bordure sable)
House_Waxley.title: The Knight of Wickenden

House_Borrell.name: House Borrell
coat of arms: A white spider crab, on a grey-green field
Vert-cendr e, a spider crab argent
title: Lord of Sweetsister
Keeper of the Night Lamp
Shield of Sisterton
Master of Breakwater Castle

House_Sunderland.name: House Sunderland
coat of arms: Three women's heads, white with black hair, on a barry wavy blue and green field
Barry wavy azure and vert, three women's heads argents, crined sable
House_Sunderland.title: Lord of the Three Sisters

House_Arryn_of_Gulltown.name: House Arryn of Gulltown
coat of arms: A sky-blue falcon soaring against a white moon, on a sky-blue field
Bleu celeste, upon a plate a falcon rousant of the field

House_Royce_of_the_Gates_of_the_Moon.name: House Royce of the Gates of the Moon
coat of arms: A black portcullis over a white crescent moon, on a purple field, bordered with runes on bronze
(Purpure, a moon increscent argent surmounted by a portcullis sable, all within a bordure bronze charged with ancient runes of the third)
House_Royce_of_the_Gates_of_the_Moon.title: Lord of the Gates of the Moon
